    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:natecaji/pic592</entry>

            <entry>trubar1:natecaji/pic592</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vodni balon</string>
            <string language="en">Water balloon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserballon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballon de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Balão da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aerostato dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαλόνι ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Globo del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vodni balon je ravnokar počil, za hip je ostala pod roko le voda.</string>
            <string language="en">Water balloon at the moment of explosion - for a moment the water is still keeping its shape.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vodni balon</string>
            <string language="en">water balloon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voda</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">eksplozija</string>
            <string language="en">explosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserballon im Augenblick der Explosion - 
während eines Momentes hält das Wasser noch seine Form.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballon de l'eau à l'heure actuelle d'explosion - 
pendant un moment l'eau garde toujours sa forme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Balão da água neste momento da explosão - por 
um momento a água está mantendo ainda sua forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aerostato dell'acqua al momento dell'esplosione - 
per un momento l'acqua ancora sta mantenendo la relativa figura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαλόνι ύδατος τη στιγμή της έκρηξης - για μια στιγμή
το ύδωρ κρατά ακόμα τη μορφή του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Globo del agua en el momento de la explosión - 
por un momento el agua todavía está guardando su dimensión de una 
variable.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserballon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Explosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ballon de l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplosione</string>
          </keyword>
